availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Threlkeld Wilson in Mercer County on July 14, 1841. Father of Mary Wilson, Amanda Wilson, William Wilson, Sarah Wilson, and Daniel Wilson. Carpenter in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 84.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191857.
U.S. Federal Census Mortality Schedules (1850-1885), Kentucky, 1880, Mercer County, p. 1623.
